name: Alconost Inc.
description:
We localize websites, software, apps and games into 70+ languages. Our team consists of 700+ professional native-speaking linguists. For shorter texts try Nitro — an online human translation service.
We create and maintain multilingual PPC campaigns, SEO, landing pages, and content marketing.
We make advertising clips, trailers, teasers, pre-rolls, videos for App Store/Google Play and provide voice-over services.
Write to us about your project at alconost.com.
We use professional localization software, CAT-tools, cloud platforms, translation memories, and glossaries. We can do in sync continuous localization, proofreading, and QA. Our project managers are available 24/7.
For shorter texts, we’ve developed Nitro — an online professional translation service. Nitro is quick — 50% of orders are completed within 2 hours, 96% — in less than 24 hours. There is no minimum order — we will translate as little as 1 word. Register with Nitro and send your text for translation with just a few clicks.
We can develop an international promotion strategy, perform SEO and create a multilingual PPC advertising campaign for your website. Your personal project manager, digital marketer, web-analyst, content manager, programmer, usability specialist, link builder, PPC-manager, and copywriter are always available for your needs.
Our videos increase conversions, sales, and sign-ups and also look very cool! Videos by Alconost are dubbed by professional native-speaking voice actors. Our video managers take care of the entire process and are happy to come up with a couple of out-of-the-box ideas.
To date, we've completed over 2,000 thriving localization projects and created over 500 videos.
Tell us about your need at alconost.com  — and we'll come back to you with a custom-tailored solution.
